skills.Name: Reveal Soul
skills.Description: Reveal the bluish soul orb left by deceased thieves and adventurers. Certain spells must be cast within proximity of a soul.

skills.Name: Call to Elements
skills.Description: Call upon the elements to imbue your weapon with elemental power, adding additional damage based on your equipped weapon's damage type.

skills.Name: Mana Push
skills.Description: Release a burst of pure mana, pushing back enemies and disrupting their actions. The force of the push increases with your mana pool.

skills.Name: Weather Tolerance
skills.Description: Attune yourself to the weather, gaining resistance to its effects. Whether it's scorching heat or freezing cold, you'll endure it with ease.

skills.Name: Shamanic Resonance
skills.Description: Channel your inner shamanic energy, empowering your spells with additional effects based on your connection to nature.

skills.Name: Sigil of Wind
skills.Description: Inscribe a mystical sigil of wind, creating a swirling vortex that damages enemies caught within its radius. The sigil dissipates after a short duration.

skills.Name: Infuse Wind
skills.Description: Infuse your attacks with the power of the wind, increasing their speed and granting a chance to knock back enemies with each strike.

skills.Name: Conjure
skills.Description: Summon a spectral weapon to fight by your side. The weapon's strength and abilities depend on your own magical prowess.

skills.Name: Steady Arm
skills.Description: Temporarily increase your accuracy and stability in combat, enhancing your chances of hitting your target.

skills.Name: Shield Charge
skills.Description: Charge forward with your shield raised, knocking back enemies in your path and inflicting damage upon impact.

skills.Name: Fitness
skills.Description: Improve your physical fitness, increasing your stamina and reducing the time it takes to recover from exhaustion.

skills.Name: Spellblade's Awakening
skills.Description: Channel your magical energies into your weapon, imbuing it with elemental power and enhancing its damage for a limited time.

skills.Name: Infuse Fire
skills.Description: Infuse your attacks with the power of fire, causing additional fire damage to enemies with each strike.

skills.Name: Infuse Frost
skills.Description: Infuse your attacks with the chilling power of frost, slowing down enemies with each strike and reducing their movement speed.

skills.Name: Gong Strike
skills.Description: Unleash a powerful strike with your weapon, creating a shockwave that damages and knocks down nearby enemies.

skills.Name: Elemental Discharge
skills.Description: Release a burst of elemental energy, damaging all enemies in the area and applying elemental effects based on your weapon's imbued element.

skills.Name: Shatter Bullet
skills.Description: Fire a bullet infused with freezing energy, shattering upon impact to deal damage and apply a freezing effect to the target.

skills.Name: Frost Bullet
skills.Description: Fire a bullet imbued with frost magic, chilling enemies and slowing their movement speed upon impact.

skills.Name: Fast Maintenance
skills.Description: Quickly perform maintenance on your equipment, reducing the time it takes to repair and reload your weapons.

skills.Name: Marathoner
skills.Description: Improve your endurance and running speed, allowing you to cover greater distances without tiring as quickly.

skills.Name: Swift Foot
skills.Description: Temporarily increase your movement speed, allowing you to dart around the battlefield with increased agility.

skills.Name: Armor Training
skills.Description: Train in the art of wearing heavy armor, increasing your defense and reducing the penalties associated with wearing heavy gear.

skills.Name: Shield Infusion
skills.Description: Channel magic into your shield, imbuing it with elemental power and enhancing its defensive capabilities against specific types of attacks.

skills.Name: Blood Bullet
skills.Description: Fire a bullet infused with your own life force, sacrificing health to deal additional damage to enemies upon impact.

skills.Name: Chakram Pierce
skills.Description: Throw a chakram in a straight line, piercing through enemies and dealing damage to all targets in its path.

skills.Name: Chakram Arc
skills.Description: Send a chakram spinning in a wide arc, damaging enemies in a frontal area and knocking them back.

skills.Name: Sigil of Fire
skills.Description: Place a magical sigil infused with fire energy on the ground, creating a fiery explosion when triggered by an enemy's presence.

skills.Name: Mana Ward
skills.Description: Create a protective barrier of mana around yourself, reducing incoming damage for a short duration.

skills.Name: Leyline Connection
skills.Description: Establish a connection to the leyline, channeling its energy to rapidly regenerate your mana reserves.

skills.Name: Chakram Dance
skills.Description: Perform a mesmerizing dance with your chakrams, unleashing a flurry of rapid attacks on all nearby enemies.

skills.Name: Sigil of Ice
skills.Description: Place a magical sigil infused with ice energy on the ground, freezing enemies in its radius and slowing their movement speed.

skills.Name: Fire Affinity
skills.Description: Enhance your affinity with fire magic, increasing the potency and effectiveness of your fire-based abilities.

skills.Name: Dez
skills.Description: Blue rune that does nothing on its own, but can produce combo effects by casting other runes in the correct order.

skills.Name: Egoth
skills.Description: Purple rune that does nothing on its own, but can produce combo effects by casting other runes in the correct order.

skills.Name: Fal
skills.Description: Green rune that does nothing on its own, but can produce combo effects by casting other runes in the correct order.

skills.Name: Shim
skills.Description: Red rune that does nothing on its own, but can produce combo effects by casting other runes in the correct order.

skills.Name: Well of Mana
skills.Description: Create a magical wellspring that restores mana to you and nearby allies over time, replenishing their magical reserves.

skills.Name: Arcane Syntax
skills.Description: Unleash a barrage of arcane symbols, damaging enemies in a wide area and disrupting their magical abilities.

skills.Name: Internalized Lexicon
skills.Description: Draw upon the knowledge stored within your mind, enhancing your spellcasting abilities and reducing mana costs for a short duration.

skills.Name: Runic Prefix
skills.Description: Imbue your weapons with runic magic, enhancing their effectiveness against magical and ethereal foes.

skills.Name: Enrage
skills.Description: Enter a state of berserker rage, temporarily increasing your damage output and attack speed at the cost of reduced defense.

skills.Name: Evasion Shot
skills.Description: Fire a precise shot while evading enemy attacks, allowing you to maintain your offensive pressure while avoiding danger.

skills.Name: Hunter's Eye
skills.Description: Activate your keen senses, enhancing your perception of your surroundings and revealing hidden enemies or traps.

skills.Name: Sniper Shot
skills.Description: Take careful aim and unleash a powerful shot, dealing massive damage to a single target from a long range.

skills.Name: Survivor's Resilience
skills.Description: Tap into your inner resilience, reducing incoming damage and negating harmful status effects for a short duration.

skills.Name: Predator Leap
skills.Description: Leap forward with feral agility, closing the distance to your prey and stunning them upon impact with a powerful attack.

skills.Name: Piercing Shot
skills.Description: Fire a projectile that pierces through multiple enemies, dealing damage to all targets in its path.

skills.Name: Feral Strikes
skills.Description: Unleash a series of ferocious strikes, tearing through enemy defenses and inflicting bleeding wounds upon your foes.
